AboutPage.title: Builders of Your Digital Future.
AboutPage.description1: At WinterCode, we don't just build websites and systems. We craft experiences, solve problems, and fuel growth through innovation, passion, and technology.
AboutPage.description2: From our first line of code to our latest project launch, one thing remains constant: a deep commitment to helping businesses thrive in the digital age.
AboutPage.description3: Whether you're a startup, a growing SME, or an established brand, WinterCode becomes part of your journey — your challenges become our mission, your dreams, our blueprint.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description1: At WinterCode Design, we craft visually stunning, user-focused websites tailored to reflect your brand's identity and engage your target audience. Our web design service goes beyond aesthetics — we focus on clean, modern layouts, seamless user experience (UX), and responsive interfaces that look great on any device.
webDevelopment.description2: Whether you're launching a new brand or revamping your online presence, our design approach ensures your website is not just beautiful, but also functional, intuitive, and conversion-driven.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description1: At WinterCode Design, we create sleek, secure, and scalable e-commerce websites that help businesses sell effortlessly online. Whether you're launching a boutique or scaling a full online store, our e-commerce solutions are designed to convert visitors into paying customers with ease.
ecommerce.description2: We focus on delivering seamless shopping experiences — from intuitive product navigation to smooth checkout flows — all tailored to your brand and your market. Our team ensures that your store is not only beautiful but also fast, mobile-friendly, and easy to manage on the backend.

erpSystems.title: ERP Systems Development
erpSystems.description1: At WinterCode Design, we build fully customized ERP systems that help businesses streamline their operations, centralize their data, and automate their workflows — all in one secure, modern platform.
erpSystems.description2: From idea to execution, we handle the full lifecycle: business process analysis, UX/UI design, backend development, database architecture, API integration, and role-based dashboards. Whether you need a simple internal tool or a full-scale enterprise solution, we tailor your ERP system to your exact business needs — and make it intuitive, scalable, and future-ready.

form.hasWebsite: Do you already have a website?
form.businessDescription: Briefly describe your business: What do you do? What makes you unique?
form.targetAudience: Who is your target audience or ideal client? (e.g., young professionals, students, corporate clients, etc.)
form.mainPurpose: What is the main purpose of this website?
form.priorities: What are your top 3 priorities for this project?
form.designLikes: Are there any design styles, colors, or features you like?
form.designDislikes: Are there any design styles, colors, or features you dislike?
form.referenceWebsites: Are there any websites you admire or want to use as a reference?
form.budget: What is your estimated budget for this project?
form.timeline: What is your desired timeline for completion?
form.additional: Is there anything else you'd like to share or ask?
